channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: One Zoo Three
channel.desc: It?s Valentine?s Day, and love is in the air at the zoo, with the brothers hoping romance will blossom between some of the animals. Cam is on a mission to find his secret admirer at the zoo, while Aaron serenades lar gibbons Shany and Raff with some special Valentine's vocals. Two-toed sloth Mr Jingles gets his long claws cut to make cuddles with girlfriend Dame a bit safer. Meanwhile, emotions run high as the brothers say a heartfelt goodbye to Khumbu the snow leopard, who is leaving the zoo to look for love.
